content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `find`. It computes median over arbitrary array. Provide an example

```
function find_median(arr)
    # Sort the input array
    sorted = arr[sortperm(arr)]
    
    # Compute the length of the array
    n = length(sorted)
    
    # If the array has odd length, return the middle element
    if n % 2 == 1
        return sorted[n//2]
    end
    
    # If the array has even length, compute the average of the two middle elements
    return (sorted[n//2 - 1] + sorted[n//2]) / 2
end
```
An example usage of the `find_median` function is as follows:
```
arr = [3, 5, 7, 9, 11]
println(find_median(arr)) # prints "7"
```
